named-native-query.name: DocumentoFiscalModel.buscaPorEmitente
named-native-query.query: select * from NFA_Consolidado..NFA_CREDITOS where NUM_EMITENTE = ?1 and cast(DAT_EMISSAO as date) between ?2 and ?3 order by DAT_EMISSAO desc

named-native-query.name: DocumentoFiscalModel.buscaPorDestinatario
named-native-query.query: select * from NFA_Consolidado..NFA_CREDITOS where NUM_DESTINATARIO = ?1 and cast(DAT_EMISSAO as date) between ?2 and ?3 order by DAT_EMISSAO desc

named-native-query.name: DocumentoFiscalModel.buscaPorEmitenteDestinatario
named-native-query.query: select * from NFA_Consolidado..NFA_CREDITOS where NUM_EMITENTE = ?1 and NUM_DESTINATARIO = ?2 and cast(DAT_EMISSAO as date) between ?3 and ?4 order by DAT_EMISSAO desc
